contextId.occurrenceNote: The word "despise" is a strong word for "hate." Together the two words emphasize the intensity of Yahweh's hatred for their religious festivals. Alternate translation: "I hate your festivals very much" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-doublet]])
contextId.glQuote: I hate, I despise your festivals

contextId.occurrenceNote: Here "king's sanctuary" and "royal house" refer to the same place. Alternate translation: "this is where the national temple is, the place where the king worships" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-doublet]])
contextId.glQuote: for it is the king's sanctuary and a royal house
